mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.reviewer, r.reviewee, r.rv_content, m.member_pic, p.product_title, r.rv_score, p.product_num, p.product_pic, t.t_div, t.type_div FROM review r JOIN member m ON r.reviewer = m.member_id JOIN product p ON r.reviewee = p.product_seller and r.rv_num = p.product_num JOIN trade t ON r.reviewer = t.buy_mem_id WHERE reviewer = #{id} AND t.t_div = 1;

select r.reviewer, r.reviewee, r.rv_content, m.member_pic, p.product_title, r.rv_score, p.product_num, p.product_pic, t.t_div, t.type_div from trade t join product p on t.sell_mem_id = p.product_seller join member m on t.buy_mem_id = m.member_id join review r on r.reviewer = m.member_id and r.rv_num = p.product_num where reviewee = #{id};

select t.t_num, t.buy_mem_id,t.sell_mem_id,t.t_div,t.type_div,p.product_title,t.prod_num, p.product_price, p.product_pic,p.product_cate,m.member_nickname from trade t join product p on t.sell_mem_id = p.product_seller and t.prod_num = p.product_num join member m on t.buy_mem_id = m.member_id where t.buy_mem_id = #{id} and t.t_div = 1;

select t.t_num, t.buy_mem_id,t.sell_mem_id,t.t_div,t.type_div,p.product_title,t.prod_num, p.product_price,p.product_pic,p.product_cate,m.member_nickname from trade t join product p on t.sell_mem_id = p.product_seller and t.prod_num = p.product_num join member m on t.buy_mem_id = m.member_id where t.sell_mem_id = p.product_seller and t.prod_num = p.product_num and t_div=2;
mapper.insert: insert into review(rv_num,reviewee, reviewer, rv_score, rv_content) values(#{rv_num},#{reviewee},#{reviewer},#{rv_score},#{rv_content});
mapper.select: select avg(rv_score) from review group by reviewee having reviewee = #{reviewee}

select a.au_num, a.au_startPrice,a.au_sellerId, a.au_buyerId, a.au_bidPirce, a.au_endPirce, a.au_pic, a.au_status, a.au_title, a.au_content, a.au_category,t.type_div from trade t join auction a on t.sell_mem_id = a.au_sellerId and t.au_num = a.au_num join member m on t.buy_mem_id = m.member_id where t.buy_mem_id = #{id} and t.type_div = 2;
